title: Raj Roy interview: 'Tim Burton: The Exhibition'

video_links.name: Raj Roy interview: 'Tim Burton: The Exhibition'

brief_description: As Head of Film at MoMA (The Museum of Modern Art), New York, Raj Roy discusses the role of the film department including acquisitions, exhibitions, research, and preservation. Roy then speaks of his broad involvement in ‘Tim Burton: The Exhibition’, including the challenge of selecting the chosen artworks from tens of thousands of archived pieces. His main hope for the exhibition is that it will spark the creativity of budding artists and create the next Tim Burton.
